Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: First the task has three parts 1 Identify which cases are violating the normative rules and explain the reasons 2 Identify which cases fail to meet the desiderata conditions and clarify that these are not severe but suboptimal 3 Suggest interpretations or justifications for the observed behaviors where possible

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The normative rules are strict and must be followed From the description Sequence Application Received Credit Check Risk Assessment Loan Decision Inform Applicant If Approved Finalize Documentation Close Case Specific ordering Credit Check before Risk Assessment etc No skipping reversing or contradictory actions like finalizing documentation after rejection

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The desiderata are recommendations Credit Check within 24 hours of Application Received Inform Applicant within 48 hours of Loan Decision Perform a Follow up Call before closing the case

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Now lets look at the event logs for each case Case 1 This seems to follow the sequence perfectly No violations

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Case 2 Violations Risk Assessment before Credit Check and Finalizing Documentation after rejection

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Case 3 The sequence itself seems correct The delays are desiderata issues

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Now for Task 1 Violating normative rules Case 1 No violations Case 2 Violations in order Risk Assessment before Credit Check and Finalize Documentation after rejection Case 3 No normative violations only desiderata

Name: Validation - PE
Text: For Task 2 Failing desiderata Case 1 Lets check timings Credit Check 0930 on same day as Application Received 0900 so within 24 hours Loan Decision 1100 Inform Applicant 1300 which is within 48 hours of Loan Decision same day No mention of Follow up Call but its not required So Case 1 might not have a Follow up Call which is a desideratum failure but the description says its encouraged but not strict

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: Case 2 Focus on normative first but for desiderata Credit Check 0900 Application at 0800 so within 24 hours Loan Decision 0930 Inform Applicant Not in the log Wait is it there No for Case 2 after Loan Decision its Finalize Documentation and Close Case but Inform Applicant is missing Wait a minute the normative sequence requires Inform Applicant after Loan Decision Is that in the log for Case 2 Looking back For Case 2 Application Received Risk Assessment Credit Check Loan Decision Finalize Documentation Close Case No Inform Applicant Oh Thats a major violation The normative rules say Following the loan decision the applicant must be informed of the outcome So for Case 2 Inform Applicant is missing entirely Thats a normative violation I missed Confirming the log Yes no Inform Applicant So thats another normative violation for Case 2

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: So Case 2 Several Out of order Risk Assessment before Credit Check Finalize Documentation after rejection and missing Inform Applicant

Name: Validation - PE
Text: For Case 3 Credit Check 2024 01 14 1000 Application 2024 01 12 0900 Thats more than 24 hours about 2 days Inform Applicant 2024 01 16 1500 Loan Decision 2024 01 14 1200 From Jan 14 1200 to Jan 16 1500 is about 2 days and 3 hours so more than 48 hours No Follow up Call So desiderata violations for Case 3

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: For Task 3 Suggest interpretations or justifications For Case 2s violations Maybe there was an error in the process like a system glitch that caused Risk Assessment to start early and finalizing documentation might have been a mistake For delays in Case 3 Perhaps due to weekends or holidays or staffing issues which are common justifications for delays

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Structure the response 1 Start with normative violations Case 1 None Case 2 Several Out of order Risk Assessment before Credit Check Finalize Documentation after rejection and missing Inform Applicant Case 3 None 2 Desiderata failures Case 1 Possibly missing Follow up Call Case 2 Even if it had normative issues for desiderata Credit Check was timely but since Inform Applicant is missing thats normative Case 3 Credit Check after 24 hours Inform Applicant after 48 hours no Follow up Call 3 Justifications For Case 2 The out of order activities might be due to human error or miscommunication For Case 3 Delays could be attributed to high workload or external factors
